item.title: VEditorKit: Lightweight and Powerful Editor Kit (Part 1. NSTextStorage)
item.description: Lightweight and Powerful Editor Kit built on Texture(AsyncDisplayKit) VEditorKit provides the most core functionality needed for the editor.
